title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 45.4 - Qualified consultants
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 45.4 - Qualified consultants

State Regulations

Professional services rendered by medical specialists or consultants will be approved for reimbursement only if rendered by personnel listed in the department's file of clinical consultants and, when in-hospital care is required, if the hospital meets standards set forth in section
45.8
of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
45.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
